resources.string:
Welcome to Bennett Hire. It has three sections to complete. 
1. An Audio section where you read aloud a paragraph of text.
2. A video Section where you get 30 seconds to express yourself.
3. A Resume section where you will upload your resume.

Preparation
1. Please find a well-lit room with no background noise where you can complete this in one sitting.
 You cannot abandon, once you started the screening window. 

So, are you ready ?
